header.name: Muhammad Naeem.
header.usp: Full Stack Developer focused on shipping real, scalable products.

paragraph: I build production-grade web apps, dashboards, and backend systems using React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Supabase, Strapi, Firebase, and more, with a focus on clean, maintainable, and efficient code. I focus on solving real business problems—building fast MVPs for startups, improving existing systems, and delivering clean, maintainable, and scalable code. I’m comfortable taking a project from idea to deployment, collaborating with teams, and shipping features with speed and reliability.
